page_content: Provides login access to E-Tax BL and offers support for technical and tax-related questions.
Informs that E-Tax BL is not available for tax returns older than 2022 and directs to EasyTax for previous years.
Provides FAQs on installation, system requirements, and troubleshooting for EasyTax software.
Discusses the cari-medko platform for secure electronic transmission of periodic driving fitness examinations.
